body_html:
This is one TF_CONFIG for the first worker (as the index is 0). Is this the worker in question (which triggers the export)?

By default, the tf.contrib.learn.learn_runner will call Experiment.train for you (as this is worker), which does not trigger export by default. Did you modify the default behavior (by passing a different schedule)?

body:
This is one TF_CONFIG for the first worker (as the index is 0). Is this the worker in question (which triggers the export)?

By default, the tf.contrib.learn.learn_runner will call Experiment.train for you (as this is worker), which does not trigger export by default. Did you modify the default behavior (by passing a different schedule)?
